text: Stepmom () is a 1973 Soviet drama movie directed by Oleg Bondaryov.Вы лучшая девушка в СССР: 10 главных ролей Татьяны ДоронинойМАЧЕХА (1973) It stars Tatiana Doronina, Leonid Nevedomsky, and Lena Kostereva. ==Actors== * Tatiana Doronina as Shura Olevantseva * Leonid Nevedomsky as Pavel Olevantsev * Lena Kostereva as Sveta, Pavel's illegitimate daughter * Sasha Dalyky as Yurka * Ira Khlopkova as Alyonka * Nadezhda Fedosova as Shura's mother * Vladimir Samoilov as Viktor Vikentievich * Vera Kuznetsova as Yekaterina Alekseevna, teacher == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1973 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Stepmom (1973 movie)
